de.fha.dpmi.versioning

Interface VersionGraphDVCS

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    VersionGraphDVCSBase, VersionGraphDVCSGit

    public interface VersionGraphDVCS
    Represents a version graph implemented in a distributed versioning control system

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addSharedBranch(Branch branch, Version baseVersion)
      Adds the given Branch to this VersionGraph by branching of from the given baseVersion.
      void addSharedOrphanBranch(Branch branch)
      Adds the given Branch to this VersionGraph.
      Version branchCommit(Version version, Branch branch, java.lang.String... filePattern)
      Commits the given file to a new branch.
      Version checkOutSharedBranch(Branch b)
      Checks out the latest Version of a Branch of this VersionGraph.
      Version checkOutVersion(Version v)
      Checks out the given Version of this VersionGraph.
      Version commit(Branch branch, java.lang.String... filePattern)
      Commits file matching the given list of file patterns by adding them to the stash and committing them
      Version commit(java.io.File f, Branch b)
      Commits the given file to the given Branch of this VersionGraph.
      java.io.File getDirectory()
      Returns the local directory of the repository of this Version Graph.
      javafx.collections.ObservableList<Branch> getKnownPrivateBranches()
      Returns a list of all known Private Branches
      javafx.collections.ObservableList<Branch> getKnownSharedBranches()
      Returns a list of all known Shared Branches, retrieved from remote repository.
      java.lang.String getUri()
      Returns the URI of the remote repository.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getVersionedFiles(Version v)
      Returns all files which are part of the given version
      int getVersionOrderNumber(Version v)
      Returns the number of the given version in a total order of all versions known to this Version Graph.
      Version mergeCommit(Version version, Branch sharedBranchMergeBase, java.lang.String... filePattern)
      Merges the given version with a shared branch as a merge base.
      void push(Branch b)
      Executes a push after a commit
      void removeSharedBranch(Branch b)
      Removes the given Branch from this VersionGraph.
      void resetToCommit(Version v)
      Performs a reset to the given commit in mixed mode, i.e. index and ref are reset, but no files in the working directory are changed
      Version updateSharedBranch(Branch branch)
      Updates the given branch of this VersionGraph by fetching changes from the remote repository.

      • addSharedBranch

        void addSharedBranch(Branch branch,
                     Version baseVersion)
              throws VersionGraphException
        Adds the given Branch to this VersionGraph by branching of from the given baseVersion.
        Parameters:
        branch - branch to add
        baseVersion - version to use a base for new branch
        Throws:
        VersionGraphException

      • addSharedOrphanBranch

        void addSharedOrphanBranch(Branch branch)
                    throws VersionGraphException
        Adds the given Branch to this VersionGraph. An orphan branch is created, i.e. a branch not based on another version or branch.
        Parameters:
        branch - branch to add
        Throws:
        VersionGraphException

        Version commit(Branch branch,
               java.lang.String... filePattern)
        throws VersionGraphException
        Commits file matching the given list of file patterns by adding them to the stash and committing them
        Parameters:
        branch - branch to use for commit
        filePattern - list of file patterns
        Returns:
        Version given to the committed files

                     Branch branch,
                     java.lang.String... filePattern)
              throws VersionGraphException
        Commits the given file to a new branch.
        Parameters:
        version - the created branch is starting from this version
        branch - branch newly created branch
        filePattern - list of file patterns
        Returns:
        Version given to the file
        Throws:
        VersionGraphException

      • mergeCommit

        Version mergeCommit(Version version,
                    Branch sharedBranchMergeBase,
                    java.lang.String... filePattern)
             throws VersionGraphException
        Merges the given version with a shared branch as a merge base. Outstanding changes are committed beforehand.
        Parameters:
        version - version to merge
        sharedBranchMergeBase - merge with this branch
        filePattern - patterns for committing outstanding changes before merge
        Returns:
        latest version
        Throws:
        VersionGraphException
